column4: Hello everyone. Can some help me to install lowlatency kernel from ppa:abogani/ppa on ubutu 10.10? After adding repository, i can't find any "lowlatency" kernel's in synaptic :-(
have done everythin, but apt-get didn't find package linux-lowlatency
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:abogani/ppa; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get -y install linux-lowlatency
